title: Workplace Communication and Collaboration Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic workplace communication experience
context.additional_context: Program focused on developing practical competencies applicable to workplace settings for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply critical thinking techniques for effective communication in workplace scenarios with over 80% accuracy.
Learners enhance their ability to incorporate peer feedback during the design and execution of collaborative projects across the 5E model phases.
Learners can analyze their communication patterns and develop improvement plans through reflective journaling.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
